targets.query:
// First, get the last channel utilization for each AP
last_utilization = from(bucket: "my-bucket")
    |> range(start: -5m)
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "ruckus_ap_metrics" and r._field == "channel_utilization_5ghz")
    |> group(columns: ["ap_name"])
    |> last()
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r._value > 75) // Find the slow APs
    |> keep(columns: ["ap_name", "_value"])
    |> rename(columns: {_value: "utilization"})

// Second, get the last client count for each AP
last_client_count = from(bucket: "my-bucket")
    |> range(start: -5m)
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "ruckus_ap_metrics" and r._field == "client_count")
    |> group(columns: ["ap_name"])
    |> last()
    |> keep(columns: ["ap_name", "_value"])
    |> rename(columns: {_value: "clients"})

// Join the two results together based on the AP name
join(
    tables: {util: last_utilization, clients: last_client_count},
    on: ["ap_name"]
)
|> sort(columns: ["utilization"], desc: true)
|> group()

from(bucket: "my-bucket")
  |> range(start: -5m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "ruckus_ap_metrics" and
    r._field == "channel_utilization_5ghz"
  )
  |> group(columns: ["ap_name"])
  |> last()
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._value > 75)
  |> group()
  |> count()

from(bucket: "my-bucket")
  |> range(start: -5m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "ruckus_ap_metrics" and
    r._field == "status"
  )
  |> group(columns: ["ap_name"])
  |> last()
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._value == 0)
  |> group() // Ungroup to turn the 'ap_name' tag into a column
  |> keep(columns: ["ap_name", "_time"]) // Now this will work correctly
  |> sort(columns: ["ap_name"])

from(bucket: "my-bucket")
  |> range(start: -5m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "ruckus_ap_metrics" and
    r._field == "status"
  )
  |> group(columns: ["ap_name"])
  |> last()
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._value == 0)
  |> group()
  |> count()

from(bucket: "my-bucket")
  |> range(start: -5m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "switch_port_metrics" and
    r._field == "status" and
    r.switch == "icx8200" // Filter for the first switch
  )
  |> group(columns: ["port"])
  |> last()
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._value == 1) // Filter for "Up" status
  |> group()
  |> count()

from(bucket: "my-bucket")
  |> range(start: -5m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "switch_port_metrics" and
    r._field == "status" and
    r.switch == "icx8200" // Filter for the first switch
  )
  |> group(columns: ["port"])
  |> last()
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._value == 0) // Filter for "Down" status
  |> group()
  |> count()

from(bucket: "my-bucket")
  |> range(start: -5m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "switch_port_metrics" and
    r._field == "status" and
    r.switch == "icx8200"
  )
  |> group(columns: ["port"])
  |> last()
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._value == 2) // Filter for "Empty" status
  |> group()
  |> count()

from(bucket: "my-bucket")
  |> range(start: -5m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "switch_port_metrics" and
    r._field == "status" and
    r.switch == "icx8100" // Filter for the first switch
  )
  |> group(columns: ["port"])
  |> last()
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._value == 1) // Filter for "Up" status
  |> group()
  |> count()

from(bucket: "my-bucket")
  |> range(start: -5m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "switch_port_metrics" and
    r._field == "status" and
    r.switch == "icx8100" // Filter for the first switch
  )
  |> group(columns: ["port"])
  |> last()
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._value == 0) // Filter for "Down" status
  |> group()
  |> count()

from(bucket: "my-bucket")
  |> range(start: -5m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "switch_port_metrics" and
    r._field == "status" and
    r.switch == "icx8100"
  )
  |> group(columns: ["port"])
  |> last()
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._value == 2) // Filter for "Empty" status
  |> group()
  |> count()

from(bucket: "my-bucket")
  |> range(start: -5m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "switch_port_metrics" and
    r._field == "status" and
    r.switch == "icx8200"
  )
  |> group(columns: ["port"])
  |> last()
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "port"])

from(bucket: "my-bucket")
  |> range(start: -5m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "switch_port_metrics" and
    r._field == "status" and
    r.switch == "icx8100"
  )
  |> group(columns: ["port"])
  |> last()
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "port"])
